item.title: Takeaways from the world cup
item.description: It’s currently the World Cup, and all soccers fans around the world are following the competition. That includes me. I’m not the type of soccer fan that follows the interesting games and players of the European leagues. However, I do follow the amazing highlights of all those amazing players on Youtube, it’s very enternaining. But the World Cup is a special competition. All the best players from the best teams around the world gather in one place to compete.
